posts.post_content:
Spent too much money this year, so no more buying! However, I am still open to trading. I am looking for pre-war HOFers (any grade), post-war HOF RCs, post-war autographed RCs and autos of pre-war stars like 1960/61 Fleer, etc.

In particular, I am trying to get a collection finished of all HOF players. Cards must be period to their playing days (i.e. no later "tribute" or HOF type cards). I need several 19th century players but I won't even bother listing them here as I doubt anyone will be trading them to me. But here is a list of others I specifically need:

Bobby Wallace 
Earle Combs
Elmer Flick
Hack Wilson 
Hal Newhouser 
Jack Chesbro 
Stan Coveleski 
Phil Niekro 1964 Topps

Like I said, I am interested in any pre-war HOFers so feel free to send any scans or lists my way.




Here are some specific cards I am trading/selling. I do have a lot more, so ask if you have specific wants. Scans are available for most everything.

CARDS/PREMIUMS:

1909 T206 Sweet Caporal 150 Overprint Factory 649 Clark Griffith BVG 1
1910 T213 Coupon Cigarettes Type I Miller Huggins Portrait BVG 1
1910 W-UNC Johnny Evers BVG 1
1911 T205 Sweet Caporal Red Mordecai Brown (Raw - G range)
1919-21 W514 Walter Johnson BVG 1.5
1921 W461 Exhibits Dave Bancroft (currently at BVG, probably a 2-3)
1923 W515-2 Wilbert Robinson (Raw - Poor)
1932-33 Worch Cigar Joe Cronin (Raw - Poor)
1933 R319 Goudey Waite Hoyt (Raw - G to VG range)
1933 R319 Goudey Carl Hubbell #234 (Raw - Poor due to some stampings)
1934 R & J Hill Tris Speaker BVG 6.5
1934 R310 Butterfinger Premiums Jim Bottomley (Raw - Poor)
1934 R310 Butterfinger Premiums Waite Hoyt (Raw - Poor)
1934-36 R327 Diamond Stars Kiki Cuyler (Raw - Fair)
1936-42 Anonymous 5x7 Premium Black Borders Jimmie Foxx (Raw - EX)
1940 R335 Play Ball Earl Averill (Raw - Poor)
1946-47 Cuban Sol De Oro Club Almendares Team Premium Buck O'Neill/etc. (11 Negro Leaguers, 10 MLB, 15 Cuban HOF) (Raw - Fair)
1948 R421 Swell Babe Ruth Story Babe Ruth & William Bendix (Card #1) SGC 3
1960-65 Yankee Stadium Souvenir Shop Postcard Overprint Error Lou Gehrig (Raw - EX/MT)
1960-65 Yankee Stadium Souvenir Shop Postcard Lou Gehrig (Raw - EX/MT)
1961 Golden Press Babe Ruth ( Raw - Fair)
1961 Golden Press Lou Gehrig (Raw - Fair)
1961 Nu Cards Baseball Scoops Lou Gehrig (Raw - Good)
1964 Gold Hall of Fame Plaques Lou Gehrig (Raw - NM/MT)
1964 Gold Hall of Fame Plaques Babe Ruth (Raw - NM/MT)
1991 Topps Desert Shield Mike Blowers
1972-73 Topps Rebound Leaders (Julius Erving, Artis Gilmore & Mel Daniels) BVG 8
1972-73 Topps Oscar Robertson BVG 8


SETS:

1940-42 Editorial Bruguera Famous Sportsmen Spanish Card Set, all BVG graded - highest set on record - with: Babe Ruth, Joe Louis, Max Baer, Max Schmeling, etc.


AUTOGRAPHED CARDS:

1951 Topps Red Back Bob Feller Slabbed JSA/BVG Authentic
1953 Bowman Black & White Extension Bob Feller with JSA COA
1953 Bowman Black & White Extension Warren Spahn with JSA COA
1960 Fleer Baseball Greats Johnny Mize 
1983 Donruss HOF Heroes Johnny Mize Slabbed JSA/BGS Authentic
1983 Donruss HOF Heroes Carl Hubbell
1992 Front Row All Time Greats Monte Irvin
1993 Ted Williams Card Co. Brooks Robinson Collection Autographs Brooks Robinson
1994 Nabisco Autographs Bob Gibson
1994 Nabisco Autographs Frank Robinson
1994 Nabisco Autographs Duke Snider


PHOTOS & EPHEMERA:

1910's Bull Durham Tobacco Charm (14K Gold Plated but mostly worn off) 
1920 Boston Sunday Post Babe Ruth Pictorial Insert Special on Babe & Mrs. Ruth Babe Ruth Poor
1925 Reach Baseball Guide Single Page Reach A.L. Leaders for 1924 Babe Ruth/Walter Johnson/etc.
1926 Type I Press Photograph Walter Johnson Pitching Walter JohnsonBVG A
1930's Aqua Velva Magazine Ad Lou Gehrig
1932 Magic Names of Baseball Book Babe Ruth/Joe Jackson/Ty Cobb/etc.
1937 Baseball America Single Page Ad Who's Who In Baseball Ad Lou Gehrig
1937 Type I Press Photograph International News Joe DiMaggio/Joe Marty BVG 2
1938 Huskies Cereal Color Newspaper Ad Lou Gehrig
1938 Original Wire Photograph International News Photos Lou Gehrig/Joe Gordon - World Series BVG A
1938 Type I Press Photograph Lou Gehrig/Jack Dempsey/James Braddock
1941 Type I Press Photograph Associated Press PhotosPhil Rizzuto (Rookie Year)/Red Rolfe
1945 Coast Guard Photo/Premium Babe Ruth Wrestling! Babe Ruth/Jack Dempsey
1947 Type I Press Photograph Associated Press PhotosJoe DiMaggio/Tommy Henrich/Johnny Lindell
1950 St. Louis Cardinals & Browns Ink Blotter Brown & Bigelow Artwork Babe Ruth
1950's Type II Postcard1939 Hall of Fame ClassBabe Ruth/Cy Young/Honus Wagner/etc.
1951 Baseball Hall of Fame Records & Pictures Companion to 1950 Callahan Set Babe Ruth
1960 N.Y. Yankees Official Program Hall of Fame Cover Lou Gehrig/Babe Ruth/Joe DiMaggio/etc.
2004 Upper Deck Christmas Card Gehrig/Ruth/DiMaggio/Mantle/Jeter
